mapper.insert: INSERT INTO guardian ( name, email, password, phone ) VALUES ( #{name}, #{email}, #{password}, #{phone} )
mapper.select: SELECT guardian_id AS guardianId, name, email, password, phone, created_at AS createdAt, updated_at AS updatedAt, status FROM guardian WHERE email = #{email} AND status = 'active'
